Trigger.Name: TR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_FIELDMEMODATESENT_INSERT
Trigger.Description: Used to update the EXPECTEDDATE based on the date a field memo was sent
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_FIELDMEMODATESENT_INSERT on dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION after insert not for replication as begin update INTERACTION set EXPECTEDDATE = dateadd(day, 30, inserted.FIELDMEMODATESENT) from INTERACTION, inserted where exists (select ID from inserted where inserted.FIELDMEMODATESENT is not null) end

Trigger.Name: TR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_FIELDMEMODATESENT_UPDATE
Trigger.Description: Used to update the EXPECTEDDATE based on the date a field memo was sent
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_FIELDMEMODATESENT_UPDATE on dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION after update not for replication as begin if update(FIELDMEMODATESENT) update INTERACTION set EXPECTEDDATE = dateadd(day, 30, inserted.FIELDMEMODATESENT) from INTERACTION, inserted where exists (select ID from inserted where inserted.FIELDMEMODATESENT is not null) end
